document.full_text: roger federer reminded the tennis world of his destructive power with a 6-2 6-1 rout of german philipp kohlschreiber in the monte carlo masters second round on tuesday.
document.title: federer in destructive mood in monte carlo
lines_and_colors: roger federer reminded the tennis world of his destructive power with a 6-2 6-1 rout of german philipp kohlschreiber in the monte carlo masters second round on tuesday.
